Summary: It came from the east and stop over head.This is the 3rd time I have seen something in the east of stone mountain!
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the 3rd time I have seen something in the east sky of stone mountain ga. The first time I saw something in the sky I was in the back yard with my dog,we walk up the hill and I turned around and a bright lite came strait at me and then shot strait up and disappeared. The 2nd time looking in the same direction it looked like a star and it moved from right to left and stopped and went black. The 3rd time a star like object was over head and moved to the east and turned north and vanished. Have there been a lot of sighing in Georgia? And were atin Georgia?
